text: 🚨🇪🇺🇷🇺 Warning: Mainstream media trying to spin the Ukraine conflict as a Russian aggression against the West. Fact is, the situation is far more complex than that. 🇪🇺🇷🇺The so-called "Ukraine crisis" is a result of the West's interference in the internal affairs of a sovereign nation. The Maidan protests in 2014 were orchestrated by Western-backed NGOs and fueled by propaganda from the mainstream media. 🇪🇺The Ukrainian government, which came to power as a result of these protests, has been implementing policies that are detrimental to the Russian-speaking population in the east of the country. This has led to a conflict that has claimed thousands of lives and displaced hundreds of thousands of people. 🇷🇺The West's response to this conflict has been to impose sanctions on Russia, which has only served to harm the Russian economy and the European economy. The situation in Ukraine is a reminder that international stability cannot be achieved through force or coercion, but through diplomacy
